item.title: 鸽派的鲍威尔才是最重要的，而不是美联储的克里斯托弗-沃勒尔
item.description:
在一位著名鹰派人士发表言论后，abdrn 的希克莫尔说："不要理会，继续前进"

。【原文：

‘Ignore and move on,’ abdrn’s Hickmore says after remarks from a noted hawk

】

item.title: 2023 年乌克兰经济增长 5.3%，不畏俄罗斯攻击
item.description: 乌克兰去年经济增长了 5.3%，因为它重新夺回了对黑海出口走廊的控制权，并在俄罗斯导弹和无人机持续袭击的情况下收获了大丰收。【原文：Ukraine’s economy grew 5.3% last year as it reasserted control of a Black Sea export corridor and harvested a bumper crop despite continued Russian missile and drone attacks.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦经济增长因创纪录的利率而减弱
item.description: 在创纪录的高利率影响了企业并降低了消费需求之后，巴基斯坦第二财政季度的经济增长有所减弱。【原文：Pakistan’s economic growth weakened in the fiscal second quarter after record high interest rates impacted businesses and reduced consumer demand.】

item.title: 可可的持续上涨正将市场推向爆发点
item.description: 全球可可市场在前所未有的短缺压力下举步维艰。【原文：The global cocoa market is buckling under the strain of unprecedented shortages.】

item.title: 马拉维药用大麻品种合法化
item.description: 马拉维立法者将一种药效极强的本地大麻品种的种植合法化，用于工业和医疗用途。【原文：Malawian legislators legalized the cultivation of a highly potent local variety of cannabis for industrial and medicinal use.】

item.title: 天然气生产商银弓公司称金默里奇公司的报价过低
item.description: 银弓资源公司（SilverBow Resources Inc.【原文：SilverBow Resources Inc. says an offer by activist investor Kimmeridge Energy Management Co. to combine the Texas oil and natural gas producer with its own unit is far too low.】

item.title: 碧桂园推迟发布年度业绩，预计将停牌
item.description: 曾是中国顶级房地产开发商的碧桂园控股有限公司警告称，由于需要更多信息以进行适当的会计核算，该公司将错过报告年度业绩的最后期限。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co., once China’s top property developer, warned it will miss its deadline for reporting annual results as more information is needed for appropriate accounting.】

item.title: 岸田支持日本央行宽松政策，但对日元疲软发出警告
item.description: 日本首相岸田文雄强调了维持日本宽松货币政策的必要性，同时他重申了政府对日元疲软的警告。【原文：Prime Minister Fumio Kishida pressed the need for keeping in place Japan’s monetary easing, while he repeated his administration’s warning against a weakening yen.】

item.title: 豆类短缺推动可可价格上涨，可可月销量将创历史新高
item.description: 可可在纽约市场有所回落，但仍有望创下有记录以来的最大单月涨幅，因为巧克力生产商急于购买可可豆。【原文：Cocoa retreated in New York, but was still on course for its biggest monthly gain on record as chocolate manufacturers rush to secure beans.】

item.title: 中国万科利润暴跌 46%，誓言削减 140 亿美元债务
item.description: 中国万科集团（China Vanke Co., Ltd.）去年的利润跌幅超过分析师预期，该公司发誓要削减近 140 亿美元的债务，因为这家陷入困境的开发商正试图在旷日持久的住房危机中避免违约。【原文：China Vanke Co.’s profit tumbled more than analysts expected last year and it vowed to slash debt by almost $14 billion, as the embattled developer tries to stave off default amid a protracted housing crisis.】

item.title: 为委内瑞拉石油预订的油轮已滞留数月
item.description: 一批本应从委内瑞拉装载石油的油轮已在该国沿海闲置数月之久，这让一些因制裁放松而重返该国石油贸易的贸易商头疼不已，也让船主们发了一笔横财。【原文：A batch of oil tankers that were supposed to load oil from Venezuela have been idling off of the country’s coast for months, offering a headache for some of the traders that got back into the country’s oil trade when sanctions were eased — and a payday for owners of the vessels.】

item.title: 肯尼亚航空公司寻求筹集多达 15 亿美元的资金
item.description: 肯尼亚航空公司（Kenya Airways Plc）现在寻求在重组过程中筹集多达 15 亿美元的新资本，当局称这将重振该航空公司，并堵住国家资源的流失。【原文：Kenya Airways Plc now seeks to raise as much as $1.5 billion in fresh capital in a restructuring process authorities say will revive the carrier and plug a drain on state resources.】

item.title: 债务和污水如何将泰晤士河水务公司推向边缘
item.description: 通常枯燥乏味的水务行业不应该成为新闻头条。但污水泄漏和水管漏水的丑闻让英国对这一公共资源的管理蒙上了一层阴影，也让人们对三十年前水务私有化时建立的商业模式产生了更深层次的疑问。泰晤士水务有限公司（Thames Water Ltd.）为英国约四分之一的人口提供服务，由于股东拒绝为其提供所需的现金，该公司可能面临暂时国有化的危险。【原文：The usually dull water business isn’t supposed to make news headlines. But scandals over sewage spills and leaky pipes are casting a harsh light on Britain’s management of this public resource and raising deeper questions about the business model established when it was privatized three decades ago. Things have gotten so bad that Thames Water Ltd., which serves about a quarter of the UK population, faces possible temporary nationalization after shareholders refused to stump up the cash it needs】

item.title: 100 美元油价呼声再起
item.description:
俄罗斯的减产承诺引发了关于产量恢复到三位数的讨论，但前方仍有障碍。【原文：

Russia’s pledge to cut output has sparked talk of a return to triple digits, but there are obstacles ahead.

】

item.title: 特斯拉 3,500 亿美元股价暴跌打破投资者预期
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）的股价在经历了今年的大幅下滑后，最近几天出现了生机勃勃的迹象，但投资者缺乏押注任何持久复苏所需的清晰度。【原文：Tesla Inc. shares have shown signs of life in recent days after this year’s extreme slide, but investors lack the clarity needed to bet on any lasting recovery.】

item.title: 改革故事引领新兴市场反弹，但货币却错失良机
item.description: 新兴市场在第一季度结束时充满了扭转乾坤的故事，股票和美元债券投资者获得了微薄的回报，尽管当地债务和货币仍未出现反弹。【原文：Emerging markets are closing the first quarter brimming with turnaround stories as investors in stocks and dollar bonds walk away with modest rewards, though a rally continues to elude local debt and currencies.】

item.title: Blackstone 计划在五年内增加 250 亿美元的印度私募股权投资资产
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 的目标是在未来五年再增加 250 亿美元的印度私募股权投资资产，这反映出这个南亚国家对全球投资者的吸引力与日俱增。【原文：Blackstone Inc. aims to add an additional $25 billion of Indian private equity assets over the next five years, reflecting the South Asian country’s increasing allure to global investors.】

item.title: 奈拉升至贬值后高点，加息势头强劲
item.description: 在尼日利亚央行再次上调利率后，尼日利亚遭受重创的货币继续走高，兑美元汇率达到了自 1 月份贬值以来的最强水平。【原文：Nigeria’s battered currency continued to advance following another interest-rate increase by the central bank, reaching its strongest level against the dollar since being devalued in January.】

item.title: 德国邮政在 61 年后停止在德国空运信件
item.description: 2021 年 8 月 2 日星期一，德国柏林，德国邮政股份公司分拣办公室外的标牌。德国邮政于 8 月 5 日公布上半年财报。摄影师：Krisztian Bocsi/Bloomberg【原文：Signage outside a Deutsche Post AG sorting office in Berlin, Germany, on Monday, Aug. 2, 2021. Deutsche Post reports first half earnings on Aug. 5. Photographer: Krisztian Bocsi/Bloomberg】

item.title: 卢拉与梅雷的冲突体现了世界相互竞争的经济观点
item.description:
当今世界，很少有总统能比阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱和巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦的经济模式更加截然不同

。【原文：

There are few presidents in the world today with more radically different economic models than Argentina’s Javier Milei and Brazil’s Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva

】

item.title: 埃克森称美国需要制定促进投资的航空燃油政策
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：Clearer policy from the Biden administration is needed to spur investment in green jet fuel and help bring down emissions for the aviation sector, according to Exxon Mobil Corp.】

item.title: 中国大型银行利润微薄，利润空间缩小
item.description: 由于利润率下降，中国最大的国有银行去年的盈利增长乏力。【原文：China’s largest state owned bank posted scant gains in earnings for last year as margins weakened.】

item.title: 巴西央行上调 2024 年经济增长预期
item.description: Roberto Campos Neto 摄影师：Ton Molina/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Roberto Campos Neto Photographer: Ton Molina/Bloomberg】

item.title: 沃尔格林收紧业绩展望，同时超出季度预期
item.description: 沃尔格林博姿联盟公司（Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc.【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. narrowed its fiscal 2024 guidance even as the drugstore chain beat Wall Street’s estimates for second-quarter profit and revenue.】

item.title: 家得宝将以约 182.5 亿美元收购屋顶供应公司 SRS
item.description: 家得宝公司表示，将以约 182.5 亿美元的价格收购屋顶供应公司 SRS Distribution Inc.【原文：Home Depot Inc. said it would buy roof-supply firm SRS Distribution Inc. for about $18.25 billion in a bid to bolster the company’s professional services business.】

item.title: 鲍威尔在债券市场上押注通胀，并向就业倾斜
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）越来越重视保护就业市场，这鼓励了一大批债券交易商押注通胀率将继续走高。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s increasing focus on protecting the job market is encouraging a swath of bond traders putting bets on inflation rates to remain elevated.】

item.title: 俄罗斯向古巴输送一年来第一批石油以缓解停电和动荡局势
item.description: 本周，当一艘俄罗斯油轮停靠在哈瓦那以东时，古巴官员将如释重负，因为他们正试图阻止日益加剧的动乱。【原文：When a Russian fuel tanker docks east of Havana this week, it will be welcome relief for Cuban officials trying to stymie growing unrest.】

item.title: 迷幻药和摇头丸吸引商人押注 "迷幻文艺复兴
item.description: 多年来，将资金投入迷幻股票的投资者一直在打赌，他们的爆发时刻和随之而来的令人瞠目结舌的回报指日可待。而年复一年，这基本上都是一场失败的赌注。【原文：For years, investors that poured money into psychedelic stocks have wagered that their breakout moment — and the eye-watering returns that would quickly follow — were just around the corner. And year after year it’s been, by-and-large, a losing bet.】

item.title: 资金管理者聘请调查员寻找私人资产价值
item.description: 投资者对私人市场资产价值的信心已经跌到了极点，以至于有些人开始自行其是。【原文：Investor faith in private market asset values has plumbed such depths that some are taking matters into their own hands.】

item.title: 欧洲 IPO 反弹步伐加快，创 2022 年以来最大季度涨幅
item.description: 2024 年欧洲首次公开募股的强劲开端，是由市场上少数几个备受瞩目的新公司推动的，这预示着今年下半年该地区的上市活动将出现反弹。【原文：A strong start for Europe’s initial public offerings in 2024, driven by a handful of high-profile newcomers to the market, bodes well for a rebound in listings in the region for the rest of the year.】
